text: karobriebthieb banda anak del brichcheak tropy sa mb tde robsa puokke knong meakra a l laoh brieb dauchchea thonhnhocheate muoy kreab del ban doh chenh chea brapir kuor haey nowknong kuor ni muoy mean muoy ry kreab . haey a l laoh nung banthem aoy leusa pi nih champoh anak na del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh mha toulomtouleay mha doeng
